entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:51 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
